zh: 你是不是快幸福死了呀
py: Nǐ shì bùshì kuài xìngfú sǐle ya
Gǎo kēyán de mèilì zhème dà
en: Is the charm of a researcher so great?

py: Wǒ duì huàxué yìnxiàng zuìshēn de
en: is the concentrated sulfuric acid experiment.
is the concentrated sulfuric acid experiment.

py: Bǐ nǐ shāowéi duō yī diǎndiǎn ba
en: A little bit more than you do.

py: shì bùshì huàn yī zhǒng shuōfǎ
huì xiǎndé gèng yǒu wénhuà yīxiē

en: How come I forgot it all?
I gave it all back to the teacher.

py: Yě zhìlì yú wājué yǒu qiánlì
en: We are also dedicated to finding potential
new stars with this attitude in the industry.

py: wǒ yào bùyào chūmén yíng yīxià
en: Should I go out to meet him?

zh: 本来已经在来的路上了
py: běnlái yǐjīng zài lái de lùshàngle
en: He was already on his way here.
Something came up in the lab.

zh: 我们不仅邀请到各位获奖嘉宾
py: wǒmen bùjǐn yāoqǐng dào gèwèi huòjiǎng jiābīn
en: not only invited all the award winners here,

zh: 我们不仅邀请到各位获奖嘉宾
py: Wǒmen bùjǐn yāoqǐng dào gèwèi huòjiǎng jiābīn
gèng yǒu bù shǎo zīshēn qiánbèi
en: not only invited all the award winners here,

py: Gèng yǒu bù shǎo zīshēn qiánbèi
en: and big names in the industry
and big names in the industry
are also here to celebrate the event together.

zh: 时宜小姐 该我们了
en: Miss Shi Yi, it's our turn.

py: Jiē xiàlái jíjiāng jiēxiǎo de shì
huòdé běn jiè huáxīng jiǎng de

en: Please give them a warm welcome.

py: Wǒ píngshí bù zě me kāichē
en: I'm afraid of parking it at the wrong place.

py: Nǐ shuō nǐ bǎ yàoshi gěi bǎo'ān
en: Just give the keys to the security guard

py: Ràng tāmen zhíjiē gěi nǐ tíng dào
en: and let them park your car
What should I say about you?

zh: 时老师今天要登台两次
py: Shí lǎoshī jīntiān yào dēngtái liǎng cì
en: Miss Shi will be on stage twice today.
You already missed the first time.

py: zhèngzài tái shàng jǐ rén bānjiǎng ne
en: She's probably giving an award to someone on stage
You should hurry up and catch her.
Where are you going to sit?

zh: 她给了我一张中间的票
py: Tā gěile wǒ yī zhāng zhōngjiān de piào
en: She gave me a ticket in the middle row.

py: Dàn wǒ juédé wǒ xiànzài jìnqù
huì bù huì bù lǐmào a
en: But I'm afraid it'd be rude

py: wǒ gěi nǐ zhǎo gè dìfāng
Hái yǒu shé me yāoqiú ma
Zhǐyào néng kàn qīngchǔ tā jiùxíng
en: As long as I can see her clearly.

py: wǒmen dì yī cì tóng tái
en: our first time on stage together,

zh: 一次是你主演的电视剧
py: yī cì shì nǐ zhǔyǎn de diànshìjù
en: The first time was in a drama you starred in.

zh: 但是我在时宜老师身上
py: dànshì wǒ zài shíyí lǎoshī shēnshang
en: in the world of voice acting,
i learned a lot from Miss Shi Yi.
This place is pretty far away.
You can't be caught on camera
and you can see Shi Yi clearly too.

py: Nǐ xiān kàn wǒ qù máng
en: You watch, I'll do my thing.

py: dì sānshísì jiè huáxīng jiǎng de
Huòdé zuì jiā jìlùpiàn de shì
en: the best documentary award goes to…
for winning the Best Documentary Award.

py: Yǒu qǐng rúgù dǎoyǎn wáng tóng
en: Please welcome the director of "As Always", Wang Tong
up on the stage to receive the award.

py: wǒ xiǎng gěi nǐ yīgè jīngxǐ

zh: 能看清楚你的地方就行
py: Zhǐyào ràng wǒ zuò zài yīgè
néng kàn qīngchǔ nǐ dì dìfāng jiùxíng
en: To just let me sit in a place
where I can see you clearly.

py: dōu shì zhǔbàn fāng de guìbīn

en: I more or less guessed that.
You don't have to wait until the end?
The award has already been given out.

zh: 一会儿让工作人员发现
你们每一个人的付出和热爱
py: Nǐmen měi yīgè rén de fùchū hé rè'ài
